いよいよ最後の騎馬戦ね！: It's finally time for the final cavalry battle!
ここで１位を取れば私達が優勝だけど……: If we win first place here, we'll win, but...
あのチームが今トップの……: That team is at the top right now...
あそこが１位を取るのは絶対に阻止しないと……: We have to prevent that place from taking first place...
簡単には優勝させてくれなさそうね。: It doesn't look like they'll let us win that easily.
（凄いプレッシャーだな……\n普通だったらいつものパフォーマンスが出ない状況だが:
(That's a lot of pressure...)
Normally, I wouldn't be able to put on my usual performance, but...)
あらＡクラスの皆さん、調子が良いようね！: Oh, everyone in Class A seems to be in good shape!
（うお、なんだか筋肉に自信ありますみたいなチームまで！）: (Whoa, even a team that seems confident in their muscles!)
ふふん、当然よ！ \nだって、今のあたし達に怖いものなんて何一つないわ！:
Hehe, of course!
After all, there's nothing to be afraid of right now!
ふーん、プレ・クラス－Ａのリーダーねぇ……\n近くで見てもカリスマ性の欠片も感じ:
Hmm, the leader of Pre-Class-A, huh...
Even up close, I don't feel a shred of charisma.
ジュリー、気にする必要はないわ。: There's no need to worry about it, Julie.
（ふむ、心香は冷静だな。煽って冷静さを奪おうという作戦に、\n取り合わないでいい:
(Hmm, Kokoru is calm. His plan to rile her up and rob her of her composure...)
I can tell you right away that you don't need to fight.)
確かに、ジュリーちゃんはちょっと……んー、かなり？\nポンコツな所はあるけど！:
You're right, Julie is a bit... Hmm, quite a bit?
There's a part of him that's clunky, though!
の、ノエル！？ い、今ポンコツって言ったわよね！？: N-Noel?! D-Didn't you just call me a ditz?!
でも、メンバーみんなの事を考えてくれる立派なリーダーなんだよ！: But he's a great leader who thinks about all the members!
そうね。このチームの誰が欠けても、ここまでの結果は出せなかった。\n私も自信を持:
That's right. No matter who was missing on this team, we couldn't get this far.
I can say with confidence that this team is the best.
挑発して心を乱してこようって作戦だったかもしれないけど、\nそんな安っぽい言葉で:
The plan might have been to provoke her and upset her heart, but...
We won't waver with cheap words like that.
（思いっきりジュリーは揺れそうになってたが……\nまあ、弱点をカバーし合えるのも:
(Julie was about to shake as hard as she could, but...)
Well, it's a requirement for a good team to be able to cover each other's weaknesses.)
ふん、思ったより骨のあるチームみたいね。\nでも試合でその心意気がどこまで通用す:
Hmph. Looks like they're a tougher team than I thought.
But I'm looking forward to seeing how well that spirit will work in the match.
ええ！ どこからでもかかってきなさい！ \nぜっっっっっったいに負けないんだから:
Yes! Come at me from anywhere!
I won't lose to you!!
じゃあ、試合で会いましょう！: Well then, let's meet at the match!
（この団結力があるなら……心配はいらないな）: (I don't need to worry about that... with this unity.)
よーし！ それじゃあ絶対に勝つわよ！: All right! Then we'll definitely win!
あんたたち！\nトップのあいつらから攻めるわよ！:
You guys!
Let's start with those guys at the top!
あっちから敵が来るよ！: The enemy is coming from over there!
分かったわ！ 任せて！: All right! Leave it to me!
ぐぬぬ！ 後ろは私が支えるから！: Grrr! I'll support you from behind!
（！！ 凄く動きやすい……それにラウラ、凄い集中力だわ）: (!! It's so easy to move around... And Laura, you're so focused.)
よーし！ 立ち上がり、良い動きだぞー！！: All right! Stand up and move!!
（騎馬の３人が完璧な連携で心香を支えてるな。\n移動も常に戦いやすいポジションを:
(The three cavalrymen are supporting Kokoro with perfect coordination.
Even moving is always in an easy-to-fight position.)
（……あの時言われた言葉のおかげで、頑張れるわ！）: (...Thanks to what he said back then, I can do my best!)
（最初は心香ちゃんに幻滅されたんじゃないかって、\nそんな風に思っていたけど……:
(At first, I thought she might have been disillusioned with Shinka-chan
That's what I thought, but...)
（あの、いつもクールな心香ちゃんが、\n真っすぐに私の事を見て言ってくれた……）:
(Um, Shinka-chan, who's always so cool...
She looked straight at me and said...)
『そんな風に悩んで優勝を諦めるくらいなら結果を出して、\nプレ・クラス－Ａをチー:
"Rather than worrying about it like that and giving up on winning, I'd rather get results
Why don't we just let Pre-Class-A be recognized as a team?'
『悩んで負けたら、結局解散するのよ。\nなら……そんな夢みたいなワガママを言った:
"If you worry and lose, you'll be disbanded in the end.
In that case... you should just say something so dreamy and selfish.'
『私だって、みんなと一緒にチームになれるなら……\nどれだけ大変な道だとしても、:
"If I can be a team with everyone else, too...
No matter how hard the road is, it's better that way.'
（心香ちゃんから、\nあんな熱い言葉をもらうなんて思ってなかったな）:
(From Shinka-chan...
I didn't expect to hear such passionate words from you.)
（私は、もっと皆の気持ちを確認して、相談して……\n声に出すべきだったんだ）:
(I need to confirm everyone's feelings more and consult with them...)
I should have said it aloud.)
（もしも、離れ離れになってもいいと思ってたらどうしよう）: (What should I do if I think it's okay for us to be separated?)
（こんなことを考えているのが自分だけだったら……）: (If I were the only one thinking about this...)
（そんな事をずっと考えていたけど、一歩、ほんの一歩勇気を出して……\nそうしたら:
(I've been thinking about that for a long time, but I've worked up the courage to take one step, just one step...)
That's how I became one with everyone! I was able to become a real comrade!)
（だから、絶対に負けたくない！ 皆と勝ちたい！！）: (That's why I absolutely don't want to lose! I want to win with everyone!!)
次！ ２時の方向から来るよ！: Next! It's coming from two o'clock!
よーし！ 踏ん張りどころだね！！: All right! Time to brace myself!!
プレ・クラス－Ａ……調子がいいみたいじゃない。\nでも、これ以上は思い通りにはさ:
Pre-Class-A... Looks like you're in good shape.
But I won't let you have your way any longer! I'll crush you!!
（試合前に煽ってきた奴か……いやだからガタイ良すぎるって。\nでも、今のあいつら:
(The guy who fanned the flames before the match, huh...? No, like I said, he's too tough.
But right now, with them!!)
今の私達に怖いものなんて無いんだから！: There's nothing to be afraid of right now!
（心香ちゃんの体勢が崩れそう！ 支えなきゃ！！）: (Kokoroka-chan's losing her balance! I have to support her!!)
ありがとう、ラウラ！ 助かった！: Thank you, Laura! You saved me!
し、しぶといわね……こうなったら……\n皆！ 全力で体重をかけるわよ！！:
Y-You're so stubborn... Now that it's come to this...
Everyone! Let's put all our weight into this!!
お、重い～\nこのままじゃ、潰れちゃうよ～:
Oh, it's heavy~
At this rate, we'll be crushed~
（まずいな、あっちのチームとの体格差がありすぎる。\nどうにか持ちこたえられれば:
(This is bad. There's too much of a difference in physique between us and the other team.
I hope I can hold out somehow...!)
……そうよ……私の力は、この時のために……！\nむむ、てやああああああああああ！:
...That's right... My power is for this moment...!
Mmm, teyaaaaahhhh!!
皆！ ラウラを信じて支えてあげて！！: Everyone! Believe in Laura and support her!!
（あれだけ言わせちゃった心香ちゃんの信頼に、\n絶対に応えて見せる！）:
(Kokoroka-chan's trust in me after making me say so much...
I'll definitely respond!)
ノエル！ 一緒にラウラを支えるわよ！\n皆の力が合わされば、絶対に勝てるんだから:
Noel! Let's support Laura together!
If we all work together, we'll definitely win!
う、うそ！？ 私達が押し返されてるなんてっ……！\nなんてパワーなの……！？:
N-No way! We're being pushed back...!
What power...!?
皆、気を抜かないで！ \n次のチームが…………:
Keep your guard up, everyone!
The next team...
……ほ、ホントだ……もう誰もいない！\nあたし達だけよ！:
...I-It's true... There's no one here anymore!
It's just us!
ただ今の騎馬戦、プレ・クラス－Ａの勝利となります！: However, the current jousting match will be a victory for Pre-Class-A!
騎馬戦に勝利したプレ・クラスーＡは見事に優勝し……\n彼女たちへは表彰されて、優:
Pre-Class A won the jousting match and won spectacularly...
The girls received an award, and a medal was sent as proof of their victory.
ねえねえ、見て見て！ 優勝メダルよ！\nこんなのつけたの、あたし初めてだわ！:
Hey, hey, look! It's the winning medal!
I've never worn anything like this before!
うん、私も初めて！\n普通のメダルなのに、こんなに嬉しいんだね！:
Yeah, this is my first time too!
Even though it's a normal medal, I'm so happy!
……ふふ。いつも通りなのは二人らしいわね。\n……このメダルも昔貰ったメダルに負:
...Heheh. It's just like you two to be the same as always.
...This medal is as happy as the one I got in the past.
泣かないのラウラ！\nこれも、皆が皆の事を信じたからよ！:
Don't cry, Laura!
This is all because everyone believed in you!
そうだよね、皆の心が一つになった結果だね！: That's right, it's the result of everyone's hearts becoming one!
私、このチームで本当に良かった！: I'm so glad I was on this team!
正直、あなた達の事、舐めてたわ。\nラッキーだけで話題になったチームだってね。で:
Honestly, I underestimated you guys.
It's a team that was the talk of the town just because they were lucky. But that's not it.
ふふ、言ったでしょ。あたし達、最高のチームだって！: Hehe, I told you. We're the best team ever!
貴方たちも強かったけども……\n私たちの方が少しだけ勝っていただけ。:
You guys were strong too, but...
We just won a little.
そうそう！ 流石にラウラちゃんが押し返してなかったら、\nあのままわたし達潰され:
That's right! If Laura hadn't pushed him back...
We might have been crushed and lost like that!
そうね……ねえ、聞いてもいい？ 同じ特別養成校舎として。\nその強さに秘訣はある:
You're right... Hey, can I ask you something? As a fellow special training school.
I wonder if there's a secret to that strength?
えっ！ 秘訣！？ 秘訣かぁ……: Huh? The secret?! The secret, huh?
……ふふ、ジュリーちゃん。\nきっと『チームを信じる心の強さ』じゃないかしら？:
...Heehee, Julie.
Isn't it 'the strength of the heart that believes in the team'?
（……こうして、胸を張ってそう言える良いチームになったな）: (...And now we're a good team that can say that with pride.)
